name: Abyss (itch) (Francisco Castro, Hirojinho, Rafael450)
description:
Abyss

Abyss is a game about a brave archer that unfolds an endless abyss filled with monsters and a mysterious curse

Controls

W-A-S-D: Move

E: Interact

Left-Click: Shoot

Space: Jump

Alt / Right-Click: Dash
